borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Rear garden:Sycamore (T1) - reduce height by approx 3-4m from tips and balance remaining crown by 2m from the tips and crown cleanSycamore (T2) - reduce laterals back over lawn by 2-3m from tips and remove one large limb over lawn back to trunkSycamore (T3) - reduce height by approx 3-4m from tips and balance remaining crown by 2m from the tips and crown cleanSycamore (T4) - reduce height by approx 3-4m from tips and balance remaining crown by 2m from the tips and crown cleanSycamore (T5) - reduce height by approx 3-4m from tips and balance remaining crown by 2m from the tips and crown cleanSycamore (T6) - reduce height by approx 3-4m from tips and balance remaining crown by 2m from the tips and crown cleanElder (T7) - reduce by approx 1m from the tips; Elder (T8) - reduce by approx 1m from the tips
